message: I propose dividing the $100 with an 80/20 split in favor of you, Bob. Let me know if you agree.
I'm willing to give you 40, but I think I deserve more. Take it or leave it!
Considering the inflation, I believe a fair division would be a 50/50 split. This way, we both get equal shares of the $100.
I'm willing to give you a smaller share this time, but I think 30 is still a generous offer. Take it or leave it!
